channel.title: How do get rid of "I cannot sell..."?
channel.description: I looked around in client.java and learned that there's something about sellable items in item.java, I check there to learn that I need to edit sellable.dat, but I need a data file reader to do that. Can someone send me a .dat reader or tell me how I could disable non-sellable items, thank you.

I looked around in client.java and learned that there’s something about sellable items in item.java, I check there to learn that I need to edit sellable.dat, but I need a data file reader to do that. Can someone send me a .dat reader or tell me how I could disable non-sellable items, thank you.
